fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose someone to Offer to. They can choose to be attacked, or they can choose to be roleblocked. Choosing to be roleblocked grants them the "slutshaming is wrong" role with a bright pink color. They are warned of this consequence before making a decision.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- **__Part of the Daily Streak Faction.__**
- RB immune

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Brand 3 players with a new role
